## Housekeeping

* Practical skills assessment 12/5

## Learning objectives

* Review and practice monitoring methods covered in class using the [Skills checklist](https://smr-monitoring.github.io/MRNE395-2025SP/skills-checklist.html)


### Supplies

* Water samples
* YSI
* Secchi disk
* Fluorometer
* LiCOR
* monitoring datasheet
* EXO and calibration supplies
* line, buoys, bricks
* filtering funnels, flasks, forceps, filters, foils, labeling tape, skinny sharpies
